text: Herberts Bērtulsons (14 September 1903 - February 1942) was a Latvian alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. He was executed during World War II in a Soviet prison camp. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Latvian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Latvia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Riga Category:German military personnel killed in World War II
title: Herberts Bērtulsons
